description: This is a modern 'Namespaces View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

panels.title: Namespace(s) usage on total cluster CPU in %
Namespace(s) usage on total cluster RAM in %
Namespace(s) usage on available CPU Quota in %
Namespace(s) usage on available RAM Quota in %
Namespace(s) CPU Resource Quotas in cores
Namespace(s) RAM Resource Quotas in bytes
Persistent Volumes - Capacity and usage in %
Persistent Volumes - Capacity and usage in bytes

title: Kubernetes / Views / Namespaces
